language.title: Select the language
language.txt: Click on the respective emojis to switch the language!
language.txt1: The language has been changed to:
language.error: This guild is already in your chosen language!
language.PT: Caso queira trocar a lingua para portugu√™s clique em:
language.US: If you want to change the language to english click in:

bot.ctx: A simple but very cool bot, I bet that you will like my functions

clear.cleared: The chat was cleared by {{USER}}, and {{COUNT}} messages were also deleted!
clear.noNumber: You need to provide me the number of messages you want to delete

dragracing.commandDescription: Run a race with another user.
dragracing.noUser: **You didn't mention the user you want to run with!**
dragracing.draw: There was a technical draw better to make another dispute right?
dragracing.win:
Drag racing üèé 
 This time the winner was ** {{ganhador}} ** luck or skill?

color.commandDescription: Shows the color that the user enters.
color.args: You need to enter a color.
color.format: The color must be in the ** # RRGGBB ** or ** # RGB ** format.

lyrics.commandDescription: Shows the lyrics of the song that the user enters.
lyrics.noSong: Please enter the name of the desired ** song **!

serverinfo.commandDescription: Shows the information of the server on which the command is run.
serverinfo.name: Name

ping.commandDescription: Show the time resnponse of bot.

reload.error: An error ocurred to reload the command
reload.missingCommand: Please insert the `name` or an `aliase` of command to be reloaded!

reloadlocales.error: An error occurred while reloading the system: **{{error}}**
reloadlocales.sucess: The system has been reloaded with**success**!

say.commandDescription: Makes the bot send a message.

language.noCode: You need  to provide me the language code!

prefix.missingPrefix: you need to provide me a prefix!

commandchannel.commandDescription: Configures the channels that the bot accepts commands.

set.commandDescription: I inset a channel in the whitelist.
set.setChannelSuccessfully: The channel **{{- name}}** has been insert whit success!

remove.commandDescription: I remove a channel in the whitelist.
remove.removeChannelSuccessfully: Channel has been removed with success

rank.commandDescription: Shows global rank into the bot.

help.specificInformation: Write **{{helpString}}** to get the especify help of command.
help.subcommandKnowMore: Use **`{{usage}} [subcommand]`** to know more about a subcommand!

daily.alreadyClaimedDescription: You have already claimed your daily reward. You can pick up again at **{{time}}**.

rep.commandDescription: Give a rep point to a user.
rep.alreadyDonateDescription: You have already given your daily reputation point. Wait ** {{time}} ** to give again.

background.updateBackgroundSucess: Your profile background has been successfully changed!

favcolor.changedSuccessfully: The color of your profile has been changed to **{{hexadecimal}}**.

play.commandDescription: Play a music in a voice channel.
play.noTrackIdentifier: Please insert a music you like to listen!

stop.stopped: The playlist has been stoped,leaving the voicechannel...

volume.commandDescription: Adjusts the volume of music playback.
volume.missingVolumeParameter: You need to provide me with a volume level!
volume.invalidVolumeParameter: You need to provide me a valid number!
volume.notPlaying: The volume cannot be adjusted while nothing is playing!

jump.missingIndexParameter: You need to provide me the number of the song you want to skip to.

hug.missingUser: You need to mention the user you want to hug!

kiss.missingUser: You need to mention the user you want to kiss

pat.missingUser: You need to mention the user you want to pat

slap.missingUser: You need to mention the user you want to slap

ascii.commandDescription: Send an ascii text in the chat.

ban.commandDescription: Bans a member of this guild.
ban.missingUser: You need to provide me a member to ban!
ban.missingReason: You need to provide me a reason to ban!
ban.noPermission: I not have the perms**$t(permissions: BAN_MEMBERS)** to ban this member.

kick.commandDescription: Kicks a member of this server.
kick.missingUser: You need to provide me a member to kick!
kick.missingReason: you need to provide me a reason to kick!
kick.noPermission: I not have the perms**$t(permissions: KICK_MEMBERS)** to kick this member.

commands.commandsTitle: I currently have the total**`{{count}}`** command!
commands.commandsTitle_plural: I currently have the total **`{{count}}`** commands!

weather.commandDescription: Shows the weather of the inserted city.
weather.cityNotEntered: Please enter the name of the desired city.
weather.cityNotFound: The city entered was not found!

bugreport.commandDescription: Clarifies a bug for the bot developer team.
bugreport.missingBug: Sorry, you need to provide the bug.

addemoji.commandDescription: Add a new emoji to the guild
addemoji.successfullyAdded: The emoji ** {{name}} ** has been successfully added!
addemoji.createEmojiError: There was an error creating the emoji!
